action.name: Multiattack
entries: The samurai makes two Katana attacks. If it has a wakizashi drawn, it can also make a Wakizashi attack.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage, or 11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Wakizashi
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Fighting Spirit (3/day)
entries: The samurai gains 5 temporary hit points and gains advantage on all weapon attack rolls until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the theorist can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The theorist makes three necrotic burst attacks.

action.name: Necrotic Medi-Burst
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage becomes stable.

action.name: Extract Organ
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one large or smaller {@condition incapacitated} target. {@h} The target rolls all of their hit dice and takes piercing damage equal to the total. If the creature is {@condition unconscious}, that amount of damage is doubled.

reaction.name: Augment
entries: The theorist pulls energy from a creature and redirects it towards its allies. After the theorist hits a creature that isn't a Construct or Undead with its medi-burst, it chooses an ally within 60 feet of it to gain one of the following benefits:
● The ally regains one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower.
● The ally regains one use of a trait that can be used 2/day or more.
● One of the ally's traits with Recharge 6 or Recharge 5-6 immediately recharges.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The chrome prowler has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pounce (Panther)
entries: If the chrome prowler moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the chrome prowler can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite (Machine)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6+2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} saving throw against corruption or become {@condition poisoned} until the corruption is cured. Every 24 hours, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the corruption is cured. The creature dies while corrupted, it rises again as a machine.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6+2}) damage.
Chrome Prowlers are compleated cats, likely taken from the streets of Shizomi surface. These cunning constructs patrol the laboratories of the Surgical Bay, and wait to alert their masters.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The awakened doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The awakened makes two Strike attacks.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8+4}) damage.

monster.name: Eye of Myojin
languages: understands common and machine but can't speak

trait.name: False Appearance (Cloaker)
entries: If the eye is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the eye move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the eye is animate.

action.name: Eye Ray
entries: The eye shoots a beam of light at a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Detect
entries: The eye makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

Myojin is the purity overseer, a sective within the Machine Cult. His watchers and eyes are metallic constructs that he uses to protect the Great Work from outsiders. They keep the Cult informed of all the goings-on throughout the area.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Myojin makes three attacks with his claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) slashing damage. The claws are coated in strange oil.

action.name: Force of Command
entries: Each creature of Myojin's choice that is within 120 feet of him and can hear him must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by him for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Command for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Counterspell
entries: Myojin casts counterspell, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (+5).

legendary.name: Claw
entries: Myojin makes one attack with his Claws.

legendary.name: Spellcasting (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Myojin uses Spellcasting.

action.name: Eldritch Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) force damage.

reaction.name: Foresight
entries: When the seer or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the seer can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

Shining Seers are former Shizomi citizens who have been compleated with a single purpose: to divine. They use a combination of strange oil and jade power to peer into the future, attempting to give the Cult an edge.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The nomura can't be surprised while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nomura makes two attacks: one with its Tentacles and one with its Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10+ 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).  If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the nomura has advantage on attack rolls against it and can't use this attack against other targets.
